00045 #ifndef _POWER_DRV_H_
00046 #define _POWER_DRV_H_
00047 
00048 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00049    #include <avr/power.h>
00050    
00051    #if (__AVR_LIBC_VERSION__<=10602UL) //for AVRLIBC bug #23871 : clock_prescale_set() not available for ATmega32U4
00052    typedef enum
00053    {
00054        clock_div_1 = 0,
00055        clock_div_2 = 1,
00056        clock_div_4 = 2,
00057        clock_div_8 = 3,
00058        clock_div_16 = 4,
00059        clock_div_32 = 5,
00060        clock_div_64 = 6,
00061        clock_div_128 = 7,
00062        clock_div_256 = 8
00063    } clock_div_t;
00064 
00065    #define clock_prescale_set(x) \
00066    { \
00067            uint8_t tmp = _BV(CLKPCE); \
00068            __asm__ __volatile__ ( \
00069                    "in __tmp_reg__,__SREG__" "\n\t" \
00070                    "cli" "\n\t" \
00071                    "sts %1, %0" "\n\t" \
00072                    "sts %1, %2" "\n\t" \
00073                    "out __SREG__, __tmp_reg__" \
00074                    : /* no outputs */ \
00075                    : "d" (tmp), \
00076                      "M" (_SFR_MEM_ADDR(CLKPR)), \
00077                      "d" (x) \
00078                    : "r0"); \
00079    }
00080 
00081 
00082    #define clock_prescale_get()  (clock_div_t)(CLKPR & (uint8_t)((1<<CLKPS0)|(1<<CLKPS1)|(1<<CLKPS2)|(1<<CLKPS3)))
00083 
00084    #endif
00085 
00086 
00087 #endif

00092 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00093 
00094 #define Setup_idle_mode()                        (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE))
00095 #define Setup_power_down_mode()                   (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM1))
00096 #define Setup_adc_noise_reduction_mode()         (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM0))
00097 #define Setup_power_save_mode()                  (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM1)+(1<<SM0))
00098 #define Setup_standby_mode()                     (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM2)+(1<<SM1))
00099 #define Setup_ext_standby_mode()                  (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM2)+(1<<SM1)+(1<<SM0))
00100 
00110 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00111    #define Clear_prescaler()                       (clock_prescale_set(0))
00112 #else
00113    #define Clear_prescaler()                       (Set_cpu_prescaler(0))
00114 #endif
00115 
00125 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00126    #define Set_cpu_prescaler(x)                        (clock_prescale_set(x))
00127 #else
00128    extern void Set_cpu_prescaler(U8 x);
00129 #endif
00130 
00131 
00132 #define Sleep_instruction()              {asm("SLEEP");}
00133 
00134 //Backward compatibility
00135 #define Set_power_down_mode()              set_power_down_mode()
00136 #define Set_idle_mode()            set_idle_mode()

00217 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00218 
00219 // Clock control
00220 #define   Enable_external_clock()       (CLKSEL0 |= (1<<EXTE))
00221 #define   Disable_external_clock()      (CLKSEL0 &= ~(1<<EXTE))
00222 #define   Enable_RC_clock()             (CLKSEL0 |= (1<<RCE))
00223 #define   Disable_RC_clock()            (CLKSEL0 &= ~(1<<RCE))
00224 
00225 // Clock state
00226 #define   External_clock_ready()        (((CLKSTA&(1<<EXTON)) != 0) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00227 #define   RC_clock_ready()              (((CLKSTA&(1<<RCON)) != 0) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00228 
00229 // Clock selection
00230 #define   Select_external_clock()       (CLKSEL0 |= (1<<CLKS))
00231 #define   Select_RC_clock()             (CLKSEL0 &= ~(1<<CLKS))
00232 
00233 // Clock settings : when using a clock source, only the other clock source setting can be modified
00234 // Set the source setting of the next clock source to use before switching to it
00235 #define   Load_ext_clock_config(cfg)    (CLKSEL1 = (CLKSEL1&0xF0) | ((cfg&0x0F)<<EXCKSEL0), \
00236                                          CLKSEL0 = (CLKSEL0&0xCF) | (((cfg&0x30)>>4)<<EXSUT0))
00237 
00238 #define   Load_RC_clock_config(cfg)     (CLKSEL1 = (CLKSEL1&0x0F) | ((cfg&0x0F)<<RCCKSEL0), \
00239                                          CLKSEL0 = (CLKSEL0&0x3F) | (((cfg&0x30)>>4)<<RCSUT0))
00240 
00241 //_____ C L O C K   D E F I N I T I O N S ______________________________________
00242 // Configuration byte defined as SUT<1:0> & CKSEL<3:0> (CKSEL0 is the LSb)
00243 
00244 // Interal RC oscillator (frequency between 7.3 and 8.1 MHz)
00245 #define   OSC_INTRC_0MS                  0x02
00246 #define   OSC_INTRC_4MS                  0x12
00247 #define   OSC_INTRC_65MS                 0x22
00248 
00249 // External crystal, frequency between 0.3 and 0.9 MHz
00250 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_258CK_4MS      0x08
00251 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_258CK_65MS     0x18
00252 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_1KCK_0MS       0x28
00253 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_1KCK_4MS       0x38
00254 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_1KCK_65MS      0x09
00255 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_16KCK_0MS      0x19
00256 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_16KCK_4MS      0x29
00257 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE1_16KCK_65MS     0x39
00258 
00259 // External crystal, frequency between 0.9 and 3 MHz
00260 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_258CK_4MS      0x0A
00261 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_258CK_65MS     0x1A
00262 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_1KCK_0MS       0x2A
00263 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_1KCK_4MS       0x3A
00264 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_1KCK_65MS      0x0B
00265 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_16KCK_0MS      0x1B
00266 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_16KCK_4MS      0x2B
00267 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE2_16KCK_65MS     0x3B
00268 
00269 // External crystal, frequency between 3 and 8 MHz
00270 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_258CK_4MS      0x0C
00271 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_258CK_65MS     0x1C
00272 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_1KCK_0MS       0x2C
00273 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_1KCK_4MS       0x3C
00274 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_1KCK_65MS      0x0D
00275 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_16KCK_0MS      0x1D
00276 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_16KCK_4MS      0x2D
00277 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE3_16KCK_65MS     0x3D
00278 
00279 // External crystal, frequency between 8 and 16 MHz
00280 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_258CK_4MS      0x0E
00281 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_258CK_65MS     0x1E
00282 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_1KCK_0MS       0x2E
00283 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_1KCK_4MS       0x3E
00284 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_1KCK_65MS      0x0F
00285 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_16KCK_0MS      0x1F
00286 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_16KCK_4MS      0x2F
00287 #define   OSC_XTAL_RANGE4_16KCK_65MS     0x3F
00288 
00289 // External clock
00290 #define   OSC_EXTCLK_0MS                 0x00
00291 #define   OSC_EXTCLK_4MS                 0x10
00292 #define   OSC_EXTCLK_65MS                0x20
